description: Welcome to HEN Colors! HEN Colors is a NFT project exclusively minted on hicetnunc.xyz  I will be dropping a small batch of hex code color swatches. Every time you buy a color swatch you will have the opportunity to mix it with a color swatch you already own. Once mixed I will mint that new color swatch on HEN and send it to you. There will also be color mixing cards available to purchase in case you were to purchase a color swatch on the secondary market and wanted to mix it with another color
